content: i heart greenland i designed these sweet little greenland homes to show my support for greenland bullying is not acceptable on any level and for any reason have you heard of craftivism one of knitting4peace s members did a wonderful video on revolutionary craftivism betsy greer who coined the phrase said craftivism is a way of looking at life where voicing opinions through creativity makes your voice stronger your compassion deeper & your quest for justice more infinite at turbulent and sad times like these it s easy to feel we can t make a difference but don t forget how powerful knitters and crocheters truly are copyright january 2026 by natasha hanson all rights reserved 1 finished measurements the roof is knit flat in 2 pieces and joined 3 /7 5cm together with a 3-needle
